name: top-browser
description: A minimal Electron internet browser application that always stays on top of your screen

scripts.build: rm -rf Top-Browser-darwin-x64 && electron-packager . Top-Browser && cp browser.icns Top-Browser-darwin-x64/Top-Browser.app/Contents/Resources/electron.icns && asar pack Top-Browser-darwin-x64/Top-Browser.app/Contents/Resources/app Top-Browser-darwin-x64/Top-Browser.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar && rm -rf Top-Browser-darwin-x64/Top-Browser.app/Contents/Resources/app

author: Leandro Kim
